name: Bomber Snake (Mylan)
description: Bomber Snake is a 2D game mixing the popular Bomberman and Snake games. The player controls a snake in an environment littered with bombs. The player controls a snake that must eat as much as possible to grow and outgrow itself without coming into contact with itself or the scenery. Bomber Snake has two game modes, the bombs explode symmetrically in all four directions. In the easy mode, the player is in a game environment with only one bomb that explodes at a set time. In the other game mode, he is in an environment with several bombs, which themselves explode at different times for a little more difficulty.
